name: Loopin' Lobster
description:
Another game, created with the fantastic pocket-platformer from l0bster !

This time, with lobster himself !!!11oneeleven!
Lobster really wants to work on the code of pocket platformer, but under the sea, everything is a little bit different. There are slimy jumpthingys, spikey spikethingys and fork shooting cannons......wait, what?

The breathtaking features are:

  • Underwater action
  • Lobster himself
  • giggly kawaii eyes
  • Sand
  • more sand
  • a few pretty challenging levels
  • did I mention the sand?
